website_summaries.verdict: It's a good option for relaxation and head/neck support, but other models we reviewed are better for travel.
pros: This popular pillow earns praise for its patented design
360-degree support and plushy (yet supportive) memory foam
cons: A bit awkward to take along when traveling
Size also makes it difficult to use while wearing headphones

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my trip from NJ to Florence, Italy. It was a lifesaver. On the flight over, I was stuck in a middle seat and couldn't lean my head or recline my seat and this helped with my ativan-induced sleep. The pillows at my hotel were sub-par and they didn't have anymore to offer to guests, so I used this every night for 10 days and it totally helped me get some actual sleep despite a bad hotel bed.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: Whatever materials are used in these, the area of my neck that was in contact with the pillow was heated up by contact. I could not use for more than a few minutes before it became so uncomfortable, I would take it off. I was very disappointed as I hoped that this would be a useful product.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic man

customer_reviews.title: For neck pain sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic neck pain, and after 3 international flights from the U.S. to the Philippines and back I needed something to help me out. Regular neck pillows gave me back pains in my neck from head dropping to one side which would last long after my arrival. This pillows keeps your head almost completely stationary, preventing the pains of having your head drift to one side or the other. It really saved my life this 4th trip, so I hope this review helps others with chronic neck pains like mine.
customer_reviews.author: txO4

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has the high sides but I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has the high sides but I wish it gave me a little more support. Even stuffed in the travel bag it still takes up a good bit of space. Mainly because it gets balled up instead of being flattened out. I supposed it's still easier to travel with compared to my bean filled travel pillow. The clip in the center helps out quite a bit. Like any memory foam product it gets fairly warm. Adding a cooling cover or something would help out tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Robert Hollander

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is fine. I worry about the rubber not holding up ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is fine. I worry about the rubber not holding up in the back where it is thin. The connector in the front is hard to get snapped and harder to un-snap. The cover quality is very good, soft and durable. Last, it makes my neck sweat if I wear it too long.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great for long flights but not so for car naps.
customer_reviews.text: This neck pillow is very comfortable on long flights, and I love using it whether I'm next to a window or not since I like to sleep with my neck resting sideways and there's ample support so that I don't unconsciously snuggle up to the stranger next to me. The only downside I can think of is that there's not enough support/foam for the back of the neck which might not sit well for those who want to nap with their heads straight or those who want a quick nap in their cars.
customer_reviews.author: James Soe

customer_reviews.title: Only Thing That Works For Me On A Plane
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable & actually keeps my head supported. I've used lots other stuff from inflatables (yuck) to an actual pillow - this actually does the trick. I have used it in hotels where the pillows were awful, for naps where space it tight, and even to sit on. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chidanand W

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: This might be the worst purchase I've ever made on Amazon. I used the pillow for the first time on an overnight flight between LAX and LHR...and after about 90 minutes my neck and shoulders were drenched in sweat. Taking the pillow off, and allowing my neck to cool down was the highlight of my trip. This pillow will be donated to CIA to be used as a torture device for inmates at Guantanamo Bay. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymar01

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra dollars to get this kind of comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure at time of purchase how the 'memory foam' would do at supporting my head. The interweb reviews make it sound to be one of the best so I figured I would give it a go. This travel pillow supports well, is very comfortable, and packs quite nicely. I have road-tripped with it and can easily recommend the Cabeau Evolution Memory Foam Travel Neck Pillow. (Liked it so much I got one for my wife.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your head upright!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillow! Comfortable, doesn’t let your head bob and love that is has a cell phone storage. I think there is something wrong with my bag. It doesn’t “shrink down” into a nice, tight bag. The Velcro on my bag is on bottom, not in the middle. That makes it hard to travel with and it looks funny.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Allen Faust

customer_reviews.title: Best travel pillow I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pillow for over a year now and I take it with me every time I fly. It's the best travel pillow I've ever had, and I've gone through quite a few. It's the only travel pillow I've used that's properly supported my neck. If you fly anything but first class this can be the difference in enjoying your final destination or being achy by the time you get there. It's soft, firm, and supportive. There's a space for ear plugs or stowed earphones and with the toggles it doesn't fall on the plane floors. This would be awesome for passengers on long drives as well but I've not tried it for that.
customer_reviews.author: New York Minute

customer_reviews.title: but it can be rolled up to fit in its included travel case which makes it easy to tote around
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these myself several year ago and won't travel without it, so I decided to get this one for my husband. The memory foam is soft yet firm, and when you snap the clasps together both your head and neck are well supported when stuck in an upright position. It may be a little bulky, but it can be rolled up to fit in its included travel case which makes it easy to tote around. The cover is removable and machine washable so you can keep your pillow fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my trip to Europe. Compresses down nice and small, and I like that the back of it is flat, so there's no awkward leaning forward that you get form traditional neck pillows. It's nice that it has a clip on the front too. I also was able to sit it on the tray table and lay face first on it. It's still a neck pillow that you're trying to use while sleeping straight up, which is always uncomfortable, but of the neck pillows I've tried, this is the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Sybil Trelawny

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried them all, this is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot. I fly at least 4 times a month. So, comfort is very important as is ease of packing. For me this pillow really fits the bill. It gives me support so I can doze comfortably even in a middle seat and it rolls up nice and small so it doesn’t take up much room in my carry on. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for our honeymoon to ireland and worked great, high quality fabric and folds up nicely to ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for our honeymoon to ireland and worked great, high quality fabric and folds up nicely to fit in your carryon
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The design is good. The memory foam retains heat, so it can get a little warm. The reason I'm giving it one star is after three trips, gentle use, the hardware is falling apart. It seems to me like the design is sound but it's not well made. I wouldn't recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: This is way too high and thick. FYI, I do NOT have neck but this feels like I am wearing some type of medical collar. Sorry to say it is uncomfortable and I've gone back to my old inflatable. I currently use it as an armrest while watching TV
customer_reviews.author: Harry the Traveler

customer_reviews.title: First pillow I've seen with some thought and engineering behind it
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1st time on 2 hour flight. Started flight tired and got off refreshed. This was real test for me. Had some slight discomfort in neck from head going down a bit, but not nearly as much as without pillow and didn't interfere with my rest. Pillow was a bit warm and had slight smell but neither were enough to interfere with my rest. It amazes me how so many products are marketed without any real testing or the fact that they don't really work. I imagine they will be selling a lot of these and hope the testing continues to develop an even better product.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: This a really good pillow. I bought it for a flight to ...
customer_reviews.text: This a really good pillow. I bought it for a flight to Italy and I will never fly without it again. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because my one flight was a little warm and the pillow covers so much next space, I was sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Guy P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 other travel pillows (one I left on a plane) and the Cabeau is definitely much more comfortable. I used it recently for the first time on a very long flight(9 hours). The part in the back of my neck was very comfortable when I reclined my seat. My head was not too far forward and the tie kept my head from flopping forward as I nodded off.
customer_reviews.author: Angela E. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow. High enough prevent neck moving.
customer_reviews.text: Great neck pillow. The flatter back does allow more comfortable sitting against chair. It’s also high enough that will not allow neck fall side to side when fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife complained about her neck hurting her last summer as we drove cross country, I got this for her and it's been great! she sleeps well and her neck doesn't hurt anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T. Von Hoene

customer_reviews.title: Best neck pillow on the market
customer_reviews.text: I will never travel without this pillow! It compacts into a small drawstring bag when you don't need it and it restores itself back to it's full shape in seconds when you take it out of the bag. I have used it on an overnight flight to Europe and I loved that it snaps together in the front to help keep it in place. It kept my neck straight and I woke without a sore neck for the first time on a long flight. Walk right on by the cheapo neck pillows at the airport, get this one and be satisfied for years.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just came back from an overseas vacation and this neck pillow was a life saver. It allowed me to sleep comfortably on the plane and really supported my head and neck. It also can be compacted into the enclosed bag, which makes it very portable. So glad i got one for my daughter and me.
customer_reviews.author: SpEductr

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! Super comfortable and supports my neck during long flights. Although it looks big, it can easily be compressed to a small size to carry in your luggage or backpack. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Best supporting travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: Loved that my neck stayed stable. 1st time, ive been able to fall asleep, while flying, in quite some time
customer_reviews.author: MJ29

customer_reviews.title: This is the best neck pillow I've tried (and I've tried a lot)
customer_reviews.text: This is the best neck pillow I've tried (and I've tried a lot). It's the only one that keeps my head in a comfortable position. I've only used it for one trip so far, so I can't say how it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: TolyG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cool travel pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable neck pillow I have ever used! I have tried many different neck pillows and didn't keep any of them. The memory foam really conforms to your neck and fits comfortably. With other pillows, I had trouble with the pillow getting too warm and making my neck sweaty. This pillow somehow stays cool on my neck. It is compact and convenient to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moon

customer_reviews.title: It is not easy to put on and adjust
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to put on and adjust. It was recommeded by a friend but I found out it my not work as good for small neck people like me.
customer_reviews.author: Brightnews

customer_reviews.title: THE neck saver.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well keep away a stiff neck. I use it mainly in my recliner where I need a little forward head neck support but if I fall asleep its even better. Very comfortable fabric. After many hours of use it doesn't seem to have changed shape or worn down from the weight of my head on it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Yes memory foam feels better but was still very difficult to sleep on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice a difference between these and the cheaper neck pillows. Yes memory foam feels better but was still very difficult to sleep on the plane with this thing. Definitely wasn't able to sleep upright comfortably like stated. Save the money and just buy a pillow or something to bring with you.
customer_reviews.author: Phong Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Bought it because I have to sleep sitting up after surgery. Good quality, props your head up like a soft but form neck brace. The clasp is nice. I can see this getting a bit warm it it's hot, but currently i do not have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful neck support!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this neck pillow! I used it on my trip to Europe recently and could sleep very well in the trains, and flights! I have neck issues and it kept my head straight and no headaches! Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V.

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is very comfortable. I'm a fan of memory foam and this ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very comfortable. I'm a fan of memory foam and this is perfect. I like the fact that's a bit higher that other traveling pillows. Also, it doesn't take too much space. I was able to fit it into the small bag that comes with it and put it in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: MAT

customer_reviews.title: After three flights, on one location the started to ...
customer_reviews.text: After three flights, on one location the started to open so I stopped using it and later throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not an average neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: My husband spends too many hours in a hospital recliner getting chemo therapy. This neck pillow helps him relax and sleep. It's soft but structured so it holds his head and neck comfortably. We've tried several neck pillows. I highly recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: It did a great job of supporting my head
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job of supporting my head. The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 was that, at some points, there was a little too much support, and I had to take it off to move my neck around. I used this on my flights from Chicago to Tahiti, though, so I definitely had it on for a very long time, and having to take it off at some point was inevitable.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent travel pillow!!! Very comfortable no matter how you like to sleep in the seated position (if you have to sleep like that when traveling). The draw string really helps to keep it in place and makes it more snug against your neck, excellent design addition. I would HIGHLY recommend this pillow to ANY buyer looking for added comfort and neck support when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Randy V.

customer_reviews.title: I bought an Evolution pillow 2 years ago and love that one which gave me none of these issues
customer_reviews.text: Snap clip was difficult to unhook and the pouch that this product fits into ripped even though I followed instructions to completely compress the pillow. I bought an Evolution pillow 2 years ago and love that one which gave me none of these issues. I'll be ordering a new one. Maybe I got a dud?
customer_reviews.author: Nerine T Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Okay.  Bulky and awkward
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit bulky and awkward, but I got it to work well enough. Seems a bit deep in height and width. I'm 5/6", average build. I folded it in half and rested against the window or seat, rather than using it as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn B

customer_reviews.title: Compact, comfortable, and functional
customer_reviews.text: Just used this on a trans-atlantic flight. It worked great - snapping it in the front made a huge difference. The best part is it rolls up into a compact ball for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: TME

customer_reviews.title: ... bulking around my neck but I still can get comfortable and take a nap on the red
customer_reviews.text: A little bulking around my neck but I still can get comfortable and take a nap on the red eyes
customer_reviews.author: GTimBama

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, compact and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading a ton of reviews for a long flight from US to Scotland. So glad I did...comfy and supportive. This light sleeper actually got a good snooze in on the trip. Love how it rolls up and easy to pack. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gina  Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to travel with, and it is a really comfortable supportive pillow. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love this pillow.
customer_reviews.text: The added height gives better support than others I've tried. Memory foam is so much better than other fillers. This was recommended to me by a frequent flyer and I'm very satisfied with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... found a Tempur pedic neck cushion and it works great, but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t fit my neck just right so I found a Tempur pedic neck cushion and it works great, but not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lollypop

customer_reviews.title: It is provides good neck support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a replacement for the one that I lost. It is provides good neck support. The soft velour cover is cosy and it is made of good quality memory foam This neck pillow is great for long distance travel. Keep an eye on it. Use the toggle snaps to hook it around your hand luggage .....mine disappeared at O'Hare Airport.
customer_reviews.author: itsadeal

customer_reviews.title: top comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for quite some time and decided to order one for my 88 year old father. He wears it constantly and swears by it. It's a good design and super comfortable. It's not light weight like the bead ones but that memory foam is dense and a little heavy but not enough to write anything negative about it.
customer_reviews.author: Stewsan

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have bigger neck
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who has a thicker neck, loves this pillow. If you have a smaller neck, or is of smaller build, this might not work, since your chin would just fall inside the pillow (even with the buckle turn to the back of head).
customer_reviews.author: Ee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! exactly what we needed for my grandson. He has special needs and it holds perfectly his head. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: A. MARIA RC

customer_reviews.title: looking forward to trying on 13 hour plane ride
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Cabeau travel pillow, and I'm leaving tomorrow for 20 hour travel to another continent. The pillow seems fine when I tried it, but the long plane rides will really be the test. i have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: nice travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: great for plane travel...difficult to use over-ear noise cancelling headset
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: like it. I still haven't been able to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I do, anyway, like it. I still haven't been able to use it. My husband got a hold of it on the plane and fell asleep about 10 minutes later. So, yeah, I am going with like. I'm more interested in getting one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: KhouriTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Broke after short time
customer_reviews.text: The pillow seemed great at first but the front clip which was one of the best features has broken after using it on about 4 trips within a month and a half time frame. I am not happy with this because now it’s not possible to clip the pillow around my bag or neck. This should not happen on a pillow that costs $40.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very comfortable. The item arrived quickly and served me well on my long trip.
customer_reviews.author: K. Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Finish of the seams look good, toggle look sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it on a plane yet but on the couch it rocks. Seems to be getting a bit warm on the couch but on a chilly plane should be okay. The blue color is rich. Finish of the seams look good, toggle look sturdy. Overall am looking forward to using it on my trip!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth Anne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Snug and comfy. Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Snug and comfy. Used it for 10 long flights in 8 days, over 80 hrs of flights/layovers, for 20,000 air miles. Couldn't have done it without it.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: We used this for a 10 hour flight to and ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a 10 hour flight to and from Greece. Made the long flight a little more bearable compared to other flights we've done without this pillow. The extra height helps relieve neck strain and the pillow rolls up well to conserve space in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: which is very good. The foam is sturdy so your neck stays ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter Who is traveling overseas. She is still overseas so I can only attest to the quality, which is very good. The foam is sturdy so your neck stays up and shouldn't get a soar neck like with the usual round doughnut type neck pillows. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoJoMa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and very easy to fold like a cinnamon when you have to travel!
customer_reviews.author: Francesco Ponticelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable for sleeping in airplanes or as a car passenger.
customer_reviews.author: A and P

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This neck pillow is just way too big. I imagine a neck brace feels much like the Cabeau. In addition to being restricting, it gets too hot, and the sides ride up to my ears, so I can't wear headphones with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Mastersh8k

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your head supported during travel so you don't wake up with that horrible pain in your neck
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible! Keeps your head supported during travel so you don't wake up with that horrible pain in your neck. Would purchase again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Granger

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but heats up quicly
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is sooooo good! It held my head and helped my 10 hour flight to be so much easier. I slept like a baby! however, it does hit up the neck very much. I woke up a little bit nauseous a few times because my neck was on fire. Overall, I really liked it and so did my husband. He said he was a great acquisition :-)
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great support
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Definitely offers support for the neck. Rolls pretty small. Couldn’t be happier! Can’t wait to try use it on a flight in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Must have for flying
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product! My whole family and I just adore! It makes long time flying so much more comfortable. You will fall asleep as soon as you put this on or at least you will be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MarkKlark

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bad designed pillow isn’t comfortable at all. It has no support on the backside and it is super hot wearing it. What’s worse is that you can’t wear your headphones while using this pillow. Super disappointed for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Yu

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible for a pillow to be too squishy? Yes, when it's supposed to hold your head up during a flight.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Simply one of the best traveling pillows one could buy. I love mine and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CalPolyTennisGuy

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for this!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Fits perfect on my neck and holds it up tight. It is firmer than most, which is what I wanted. I have slightly longer neck and this works better than soft thin ones! Can also use for a regular pillow if need be.
customer_reviews.author: tsteidinger

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is soft and overall comfortable. Pillow does not stay in place well u ...
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is soft and overall comfortable. Pillow does not stay in place well u less the ties are use. Then it feels tight. Hard to find a happy middle ground.
customer_reviews.author: CJ FL

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product. The foam memory is great and i ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for traveling! It is a great product. The foam memory is great and i use it as a regular pillow. Highly recommend this for travel..
customer_reviews.author: Travel guru

customer_reviews.title: These are the best! Our entire family has this brand neck pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Our entire family has this brand neck pillow for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: seemed to be very good.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it was too big and bulky around my neck. It was quite uncomfortable and I knew I would not be able to use it on a long flight. The quality and accompanying items, however, seemed to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: will never travel without it. I bought it again ...
customer_reviews.text: will never travel without it. I bought it again only because, I had left it behind on a plane :(
customer_reviews.author: sarah malek

customer_reviews.title: No more bobble head!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Memory foam is high enough to support my neck. I would recommend this to anyone traveling! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsJCR

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a flight from RDU to Thailand. Very comfortable, ergonomically correct, and washable! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is very comfortable and makes my power naps a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: ok but missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the clip that pulls the two toggles close so it flops around.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyberg

customer_reviews.title: Best neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I travel for a living and could not sleep on planes without this.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use. I like the clips in the front that keep the pillow together and prevent sliding around. I enjoyed it so much, I bought one for my sister too.
customer_reviews.author: Shinael Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Will never travel without it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as great as promised! Have used it on the plane and in the car and in hotels where the pillows are too flat. Have had no trouble rolling it up to fit in bag.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before my 1 month long backpacking trip to Southeast Asia because I knew I would be spending hours on 10+ budget airlines and economy class seats. The pillow itself is very comfortable but the click fastening broke on the first flight and my head kept falling out as I fell asleep. Way too overpriced for the quality you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your neck.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was actually for an elderly man who sleeps in his lounge chair. He was having a problem with his neck and I suggested it to him. He loves it and is sleeping much more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Maydene Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Second order. First time thought I was getting travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the pillow, didn’t get the earplugs. Used the pillow from a previous purchase eneoufe to Paris was an added benefit and was amazingly snug around my neck and gave great support. Ordered a new one this year for me and 3 friends
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: this one makes possible to get relax and take a good sleep when flying
customer_reviews.text: After 3 attempts with others, this one makes possible to get relax and take a good sleep when flying.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G.

customer_reviews.title: Best neck pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it rolls up to be compact and easy to stow. Very comfortable. Holds your head in the best position. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Parkhouse

customer_reviews.title: Son's review said this was the best and he's right
customer_reviews.text: My son researched various travel pillows as he travels a lot. So when we traveling together and he lent me his Cabeau pillow I knew I had to have one too
customer_reviews.author: Kgg

customer_reviews.title: I loved this!
customer_reviews.text: Great neck support on my airline flight across country. Gave one to a friend who was traveling internationally, and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have small head to everything it was suppose to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have small head to everything it was suppose to do, it doesn't. Won't even stay together I need to sew Velcro across the front. Bouth into the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Bevey99

customer_reviews.title: This is the best neck pillow I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is the best neck pillow I have found. It is super soft, yet it supports your neck well. Others I have had let my neck lean over so far it almost touched my shoulder. I am going to get anothwr one for my mom. Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good support.
customer_reviews.text: We took these on a overseas trip to Germany. They are very good and have the most support for your head that I have seen. Three of us used them and were were all very pleased. it's amazing they fold up as small as they do.
customer_reviews.author: NC GG

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable travel pillow I have ever owned & I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable travel pillow I have ever owned & I would highly recommend it to any person who travels frequently for long distances at a time. The stability from a side to side perspective is outstanding & the clasp in the front brings it all together to provide additional support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: This is so much more supportive than other travel pillows, I often fly overseas and the is a must for a really long flight.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am tall with a long neck. This is the first neck pillow that is comfortable for me. I love the extra tall padding and the draw string.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for travel
customer_reviews.text: It is so comfortable! Very well made, the cover is nice blue color, very soft and easy to take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Magic56

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the fit was very awkward although it might work for some people
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A pillow like no other pillow. A sure bet to get one. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Travel essentials! I do wish it would be less bulky when rolled up, but I can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Jueun Jo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Neck Support
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Took a long-haul flight recently and couldn't have been happier with the pillow. Excellent neck support, soft and nice to the touch. Bought one for my mother as well.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana Romanyuk

product_meta.title: Cabeau Evolution Memory Foam Travel Pillow - The Best Neck Pillow with 360 Head & Neck Support
feature_bullets: High IQ Dynamic Density Memory Foam
AWARD WINNING: The patented Evolution Pillow is the first travel pillow constructed with high-quality memory foam that actually supports your neck without the awkward positioning and discomfort.
FOR ALL SLEEPERS: Adjust for the perfect 360 degree support whether your head leans left, right, or tends to fall forward. Complete with a flattened rear cushion perfect for all seats.
TRAVEL ACCESSORY: Whether you’re heading out on a road trip or flying to your next vacation destination, the Cabeau Evolution pillow will allow comfort and stability for the entirety of your travels.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: With raised sides and a flat back, offering 360 degrees of head and chin support; and unlike other travel pillows, this neck pillow won't push your head forward causing neck pain.
WASHABLE: Made out of high quality velour, the Cabeau Evolution Memory Foam Travel Neck Pillow includes a removable and washable cover that makes cleaning a breeze and eliminating germs easily.
